name: Where's Mom?
description:
Peacefully in the autumn forest lives you, mom and sick sis.One day you must watch over your sick sister so mom can leave to brew a potion for her. But she never comes back, where's mom?

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Shift - Run

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look

Tab - Inventory

LMB - Attack

F - Lantern

Team

Renderbydavid - Code, Modeling

Junior Amaris - Modeling, Animation, Story

Stephan Bester - Music
